Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be performed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for the interval starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and ending at the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response, whichever comes first
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1, compared with the total elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants that include multiple reviewer assignment attempts before reaching SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 versus time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average waiting time between consecutive occurrences of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 before SW-Reviewer Agreed is recorded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed follows directly after the reminder
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to the time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 versus from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 measured as the duration between its timestamp and the timestamp of the subsequent SW-Reviewer Agreed in the ACM journal peer-review workflow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed in the context of major revision cycles (e.g., after SWâ€“Major Revision due in X days)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to capture per-manuscript reviewer response latency
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
